data.name: No Reloading Demo
data.detailed_description:
NO RELOADING Demo is a single-player third-person shooter featuring cinematic bullet-time, destructible environments, a splash of rogue-lite, and a snarky robot protagonist who has to rescue its dear doggy the most stylish way possible, during its blood-soaked rampage against its captors.

Unique Protagonist

You are a robotic wanderer, who attained all sorts of fantastical technologies during your lifetime, including totally overpowered tractor-beam-like arms and legs. Unfortunately, all that technology has made you a prime target...

Stylish Mayhem

Body-check a captor against the wall, steal his gun, and begin your rampage. As you master your abilities, you will soon become an unstoppable force, capable of slowing down time, sliding, stomping, dodging, and even grabbing projectiles out of the air to throw back at your captors! All this power, but strangely, you never invested in pockets... no reloading!

Environmental Destruction

Hundreds of hand-crafted, interactable, destructible props and environment pieces, so you can see the destruction you are causing. Throw kitchen knives at enemies, launch a cargo crate into a security bot's cranium, explode questionable containers of fluid, and more! All in a procedurally generated compound for you to escape from!

Dynamic Encounters

Your captors are not known to be very intelligent individually, but when working together, they can be surprisingly adept! Prepare to face off against hordes of security guards, robots, strange technologies, and cruel tactics!

data.short_description: NO ONE STEALS YOUR DOGGY, AND LIVES. You are outnumbered and outgunned. Steal equipment from your fallen foes, slide, stomp, slice, and dodge while unleashing a time-bending, brutal, and satisfying tractor-beam-enhanced arsenal. Remember, there is NO RELOADING!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 Gigahertz Dual Core or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA or ATI graphics card after 2016.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of cartoon blood and violence.
